name: Tour of Light [PSP]
description:
Tour of Light [PSP]

Tour of Light is a homebrew anti-gravity racer for PSP.

Keep in mind this game is still in development and things like handling, graphics, sounds etc... are subject to change.

Currently you need your PSP game clock speed set to 333 MHz for the game to run at a constant 60 fps.

Older builds of the game can be found on our Discord server.

You can also find the custom game engine used in this game here.
